parse: Conjunction
str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Preposition
str2: To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.

parse: Adjective - Accusative Masculine Plural
str2: All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.

parse: Conjunction
str2: If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To will, wish, desire, be willing, intend, design.

parse: Verb - Present Infinitive Middle or Passive
str2: To come, go.

parse: Preposition
str2: Behind, after; back, backwards. From the same as opisthen with enclitic of direction; to the back, i.e. Aback.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Perhaps from a and the middle voice of rheo; to contradict, i.e. Disavow, reject, abnegate.

parse: Reflexive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: Himself, herself, itself.

parse: Conjunction
str2: And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To raise, lift up, take away, remove.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Noun - Accusative Masculine Singular
str2: A cross.

parse: Noun - Accusative Feminine Singular
str2: A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.

parse: Conjunction
str2: And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To accompany, attend, follow. Properly, to be in the same way with, i.e. To accompany.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
